body:
MicrotaskQueue::EnqueueMicrotask(v8::Isolate* v8_isolate, v8::Local<Function> function)
 - wraps a Function into a CallableTask and calls EnqueueMicrotask(*microtask).
MicrotaskQueue::EnqueueMicrotask(Tagged<Microtask> microtask)
 - stores microtask into ring_buffer_[(start_ + size_) % capacity_] and increments size_.
MicrotaskQueue::PerformCheckpointInternal(v8::Isolate* v8_isolate)
 - if microtasks_policy_ == kScoped, creates local MicrotasksScope with kDoNotRunMicrotasks,
   then calls RunMicrotasks(isolate) and ClearKeptObjects().
MicrotaskQueue::RunMicrotasks(Isolate* isolate)
 - sets is_running_microtasks_, suppresses microtask execution on v8::Isolate, and loops Execution::TryRunMicrotasks(isolate, this) to execute tasks.

Anchors: src/execution/microtask-queue.cc/.h
explanation: Captures microtask queue enqueue & checkpointing behavior used by Promise jobs and JSPromise runtime: EnqueueMicrotask is used by PromiseResolveThenableJob and TriggerPromiseReactions; PerformCheckpointInternal is invoked via MicrotasksScope::PerformCheckpoint and API entry points.
